title: Peter Schiff Warns of Bitcoin ‘Pump and Dump’ — Expects to See a ‘Massacre’
description: Economist and gold bug Peter Schiff has warned that the current bitcoin price surge looks like “another classic pump-and-dump.” Noting the significant excitement around the new spot bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs), he expressed his skepticism, stating: “I wonder when the massacre will begin.” Peter Schiff on Bitcoin ‘Pump and Dump’ The price of bitcoin soared […]

title: Steem Price Prediction 2024-2033: Will STEEM hit $1?
description: STEEM Price Prediction 2024-2033 Steem flips the model and returns the value to the most contributing people. Users become platform stakeholders, controlling their data and earning cryptocurrency rewards for each contribution. Is there any evidence of STEEM investors making huge– profits?  What’s cooking at Steem for 2024? Can STEEM reach $1 again? It’s been a […]
